name: Clockclicker
description:
The Story behind it:
A clicker game! We know them, we love them and we need a time themed one! Thats why I developed the clockclicker (with the help of a friend).

The Gameplay:
Click the clock to raise your score and impress your fellow clockclicking friends! But beware, don't click to far, or your time will run out.

Controls:
- When Downloaded and played in emulator: Click enter to start the game once loaded in your emulator. Click the "S" key to add to your score. (Can differ depending on your emulator)
- When played in browser: Click the "start" button with your mouse to start the game. Pess the "A" button with your mouse to add to your score.
